metadata.synopsis: On Orpheus first turn while the party makes their way to the Netherbrain in High Hall Interior against a firing Nautiloid and waves of Illithid. Orpheus comments on the Nautiloid and the situation at hand.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load END_MainDebugbook add Orpheus as a followerEnter High Hall InteriorStart the Nautiloid combatWait til Orpheus turn

0.speaker: Orpheus
0.text: Gh'ath! The dragons will burn them to ash!
